media:group.media:title: Communities on YouTube
media:group.media:description:
Communities on YouTube provide a dedicated space for you and your subscribers to have conversations, share updates, and connect â€“ right from your channel. You and your subscribers can create and share posts to your Community on mobile, encouraging back-and-forth conversations and fan-to-fan connections
